proof:
Proof. For any edge $uv \in E_H$, starting from the fact that $|N(u)\Delta N(v)| \le \beta \cdot M_{uv}$, it follows that
$$ \min\{d(u), d(v)\} \ge |N(u) \cap N(v)| = |N(u) \cup N(v)| - |N(u)\Delta N(v)| \ge (1 - \beta) \cdot \max\{d(u), d(v)\}, $$
which in turn implies $(1 - \beta) \cdot d(v) \le d(u) \le \frac{1}{1-\beta} \cdot d(v)$ because $\beta \in (0,1)$.
